name: Pokémon Clear Ocean
overview: Description: The story is based off of Emerald. This rom hack takes place months before PWT. Red, Leaf, Blue, and Ethan appear as the final bosses. There are new protagonists, Konshu, Kumiko and Takashi. Team Rocket appears in Hoenn instead of Team Aqua / Magma. Wallace and Brendan appear throughout history. Features: - Kanto starters - Original protagonists exchanged for Kanto's - Pokémon between 1st-3rd Gen
